div.p: This optional attribute modifies RPENALTIES, an element conceptually part of Reception in the WRITING section of entries. If a book is censored, we consider that a type of penalty. This attribute has one allowable value, CENCORSHIPYES.

div.codeblock: <RPENALTIES CENSORSHIP="censorshipYes"> Elizabeth Cellier and her printer were both arrested and made to give security for their future good behaviour. Copies of the book were burned. </RPENALTIES>
